author: Mitch Warner
comment: Nice looking face, but the date dials don't always update properly and the date in dim view is too small to read easily. Good first attempt though.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: I've updated about date update ,would you please check.

title: Looks good, but buggy

author: Guido Hamm
comment: Having it, loving it, waiting for more!
